Title: Ooyasan wa Shishunki!
Description: ['Maeda has just moved into his new apartment to live by himself. While unpacking, a cute middle school student named Chie Satonaka suddenly appears in his room. She introduces herself as his new landlord, which pleasantly surprises him as he has never seen a landlord so young. His excitement is boosted further when the gorgeous Reiko Shirai, who lives directly next to him, also introduces herself as his new neighbor.', ' ', ' ', ' ', ' ', Ooyasan wa Shishunki!, ' follows the everyday lives of Maeda and his newfound acquaintances, where each day presents itself as an opportunity for new events to unfold and new bonds to be forged.', ' ', ' ', ' ', ' [Written by MAL Rewrite]']
